DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluates the safety and efficacy of different formulations of bimatoprost ophthalmic solution compared with Bimatoprost 0.03% once-daily in patients with glaucoma or ocular hypertension. One of the test formulations was given to one eye and bimatoprost 0.03% given to the fellow eye of each patient
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Study of Different Formulations of Bimatoprost Once-Daily in Patients With Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Ocular hypertension or glaucoma in both eyes Require IOPlowering therapy in each eye Uncontrolled systemic disease Known allergy or hypersensitivity to bimatoprost
